rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 17 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:49 PM, 09 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bulacan, Metro Manila, Pampanga, Tarlac, Bataan, Cavite, Laguna, Quezon and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Castillejos, Subic, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Marcelino), Nueva Ecija(Bongabon, Carranglan, Pantabangan, Aliaga) and Rizal(San Mateo, Rodriguez, Antipolo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
